# xsd_demo

## How To Build

```shell
maven clean install
```

## Run

```shell
java -jar target/xsd-demo-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
```

## Example Request

```json
{
  "base64xml": ""
}
```

## Expected Response

```json
{
  "message": "Invoice saved successfully"
}
```

#### Notes On JAXB Usage

Jaxb used via maven compile. It should generate all classes in install process
